head: Scheme
Description
rows: Artwork
Lights as specified in the 3D artwork. This has the same effect as if the 3D lighting scheme dictionary were omitted.
None
No lights is used. That is, lighting specified in the 3D artwork is ignored.
White

Three blue-grey infinite lights, no ambient term
